title: React Native Fundamentals
description: Learn the basics of React Native development, including components, props, and state management.

title: Advanced Redux Patterns
description: Master Redux Toolkit, middleware, and advanced state management patterns for complex applications.

title: Mobile UI/UX Design
description: Create beautiful and intuitive mobile interfaces with modern design principles and animations.

title: JavaScript ES6+
description: Deep dive into modern JavaScript features including async/await, destructuring, and arrow functions.

title: API Integration & REST
description: Learn how to integrate RESTful APIs, handle authentication, and manage data fetching in mobile apps.

title: Performance Optimization
description: Optimize your React Native apps for better performance, faster load times, and smooth animations.

title: Testing in React Native
description: Learn unit testing, integration testing, and E2E testing with Jest and React Native Testing Library.

title: Firebase & React Native
description: Integrate Firebase services including authentication, Firestore database, and cloud functions.
